items.sentence: Their marriage has been strained lately because of financial problems.
Our professor promised to hold off on the final exam for another week.
Tom spent more money than he should've on an engagement ring for Mary.
Tom likes baseball and volleyball, and Mary likes skiing and swimming.
Tom knew that Mary wasn't likely to be ready when he got to her house.
Tom worked as a waiter at one of the most popular restaurants in town.
Tom and Mary made friends with the other children in the neighborhood.
I wasn't the only one in the room who knew that Tom had been arrested.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary can speak French better than he can.
Tom finally succeeded in getting Mary to tell him how she really felt.
